entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Winchester
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:15 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.0°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 30 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 10:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 10:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 10:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
